alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Gates of the Mountains; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Southern High Plains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 22 at 2:05PM MDT until October 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Snow accumulations between 3 and 12 inches at lower elevations, with up to 20 inches at ridgetops. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Southern High Plains, Cascade County below 5000ft, Judith Basin County and Judith Gap and Gates of the Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. The heavy, wet snow could lead to tree damage where foliage remains. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Power outages possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock, please visit our webpage and select Local Programs, then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Cascade County below 5000ft; Gates of the Mountains; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Southern High Plains
